name: The Cursed Doorways
description:
Find the necessary keys to open the door, avoiding the deadly ghosts throughout the dungeon. But beware, the path you take may vanish behind you...

Controls:
  • Move: WASD or arrow keys
  • Restart: R
Credits:
  • Art:
    • Player, Ghost, and Door were made taken from the Tiny Dungeon Kenney package and modified by me.
    • Everything else was made by me, although much of it was from older games.
  • Sounds:
    • Pickup key was made with SFXR
    • Others were taken from freesound.org and modified by me, and were made by:
      • MATRIXXX_
      • HorrorAudio
      • AbdrTar
      • newlocknew
      • InspectorJ

Made by Shlomito, for the 48-hour GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Theme:  Roll of the Dice.  Unfortunately I only had 24 hours to make the game so I apologize for the bad game lol
